plot: A sitcom about two sports anchors, a vain faded football star and a former Miss America, who have a love-hate relationship.
plot_en: A sitcom about two sports anchors, a vain faded football star and a former Miss America, who have a love-hate relationship.
plot_es: A sitcom about two sports anchors, a vain faded football star and a former Miss America, who have a love-hate relationship.
title: Good Sports
